text:
Hi Roy,

I have once modified a zygoterules a bit to check if arguments and gradients do not contain NaNs. It was working very nicely. If you want, I can fish it.
I add checks around line 56 in
<https://github.com/FluxML/ZygoteRules.jl/blob/master/src/adjoint.jl>
